SELECT BOARD_NUM , TITLE , WRITER , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE , READ_CNT FROM FREE_BOARD
WHERE UPPER(${searchType}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'

SELECT BOARD_NUM , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE , READ_CNT FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
